text: Ed, Edd n Eddy (Reboot TV series) is an adult animated television series created by Danny Antonucci for Cartoon Network's nighttime programming block Adult Swim. It follows the misadventures of Ed, Edd and Eddy, are former mafia caporegime from West Virginia, Virginia, and which it makes the third and only adult-oriented project by a.k.a. Cartoon, it is adult-oriented reboot series, production locations are from Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada and Ottawa, Ontario Canada. The series is Rated TV-MA for strong language, sexual content, strong violence, bloody images, bloody violence, gruesome and alcohol, drugs & smoking. The series was on the Canadian network Adult Swim in Canada is Rated 18A for sexuality, violence, and profanity. Rated R for strong language, sexual content, strong violence, bloody images, bloody violence, crime scenes, criminal activities, murders, suicides, homicides, gunfights, gunshots, gun battles, gun violence, bombs, bomb attacks, bomb blasts, explosions, knifes, knife fights, knife attacks, gruesome and alcohol, drugs & smoking. The series is not recommended for children and teens under 17. The series is Rated TV-MA is unsuitable for children and teens under 17.
title: Ed, Edd n Eddy (Reboot TV series)
